name: Citizen CZ Smart
description: Wear OS smartwatch with heart rate, GPS, speaker, Bluetooth, Google Pay.

troubleshooting_steps: Re-seat the watch band until it clicks firmly.
Ensure GPS has clear sky view; toggle GPS off/on.
Restart phone's Bluetooth and pair again via Wear OS app.

name: JBL Flip 4
description: Waterproof portable Bluetooth speaker with stereo sound.

common_issues: Pairs with only one device at a time
troubleshooting_steps: Fully charge the speaker for 3 hours.
Reset the speaker by holding volume + and Bluetooth buttons together for 5 seconds.
Update firmware using JBL Connect app.

name: Early Buy Sticky Notes 6-pack
description: Six bright-color sticky note pads (3×3 in), 100 sheets each.

troubleshooting_steps: Peel gently from one corner.
Use ballpoint pens rather than gel pens.
Store sheets in a flat container to retain adhesion.

name: ORICO USB C Docking Station, 6-in-1 USB C Dongle
description: A compact yet powerful 6-in-1 USB-C docking station offering HDMI, PD-charging, multiple USB-A ports, and high-speed data transfer — ideal for expanding laptop connectivity.

troubleshooting_steps: Ensure host device supports DisplayPort Alt Mode for HDMI output.
Use original 100 W USB-C charger and cable.
Re-seat USB-A devices and reboot hub.
support_data.warranty: 18-month limited warranty covering defects in materials and workmanship.

name: Dell Inspiron 15.6\" FHD Touchscreen Business Laptop
description: A durable business-class 15.6" touchscreen laptop powered by 10th Gen Intel Core i5, 16 GB RAM and 1 TB HDD — optimized for multitasking, productivity, and seamless collaboration.

troubleshooting_steps: Update touchscreen drivers via Dell SupportAssist.
Defragment HDD or consider SSD upgrade.
Enable ExpressCharge and reduce screen brightness.
support_data.warranty: 1-year standard warranty; optional extended coverage available.

name: SCREENPRO Universal Full Motion Ceiling Projector Mount
description: An adjustable, full-motion ceiling mount for projectors with tilt, swivel, and rotation; supports up to 22 lb and heights from 33" to 59" — suitable for home and office setups.

troubleshooting_steps: Tighten all screws after first week of use.
Use locking washers for tilt joints.
Ensure anchors match ceiling type; use toggles for drywall.

name: Brilliant Smart Dimmer Switch (Light Almond)
description: A smart wall dimmer switch that integrates with voice assistants and smart home platforms; supports motion sensing, scenes, timers, and remote control via app.

common_issues: Alexa or Google commands not recognized
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure switch is on same Wi-Fi as phone app.
Re-link voice assistant and Brilliant skill.
Enable soft-start mode in advanced settings.
support_data.warranty: 1-year limited warranty including electronics and parts.

specifications.Compatibility: Alexa, Google Assistant, HomeKit, SmartThings, Hue

name: HAPPRUN Native 1080P Portable Projector with 5G WiFi & Bluetooth
description: A portable native 1080p projector with fast 5 GHz Wi-Fi, Bluetooth audio, multiple input options, and included screen and bag — offering up to 300-inch projection for outdoor or home use.

troubleshooting_steps: Restart router and select 5 GHz network.
Reconnect Bluetooth device and adjust delay in settings.
Use manual focus wheel and ensure projector distance is correct.

name: POWMUS Android 12 Tablet 10.4-inch, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB
description: A feature-rich Android 12 tablet with 10.4" FHD IPS display, 6 GB RAM, 128 GB storage (expandable to 1 TB), dual-band Wi-Fi, GPS, parental control, and full accessory bundle — great for family and learning.

troubleshooting_steps: Ensure router is set to WPA2 and 5 GHz enabled.
Close background apps and reduce screen brightness.
Re-pair stylus, charge if applicable.

specifications.Additional: 13 MP rear + 8 MP front camera, GPS, Bluetooth 5.0

name: TechMatte USB C to Lightning Adapter (2-pack)
description: A convenient 2-pack of USB-C to Lightning adapters supporting 27 W PD fast charging and data transfer; includes anti-lost ropes — perfect for travel or charging iOS devices via modern USB-C ports.

troubleshooting_steps: Use with Apple-certified PD charger and cable.
Try alternate USB-C cable; enable USB data on host.
Ensure anti-loss rope anchored securely.

specifications.Features: Data transfer + charging, anti-loss rope included

name: QNAP TVS-h474-PT-8G-US 4 Bay High-Speed Desktop NAS
description: High-speed 4-bay desktop NAS with Intel Pentium Gold 2-core CPU, 8GB DDR4 RAM, 2.5 GbE networking, PCIe Gen 4 expandability (diskless).

troubleshooting_steps: Check Ethernet connections and restart router.
Update NAS firmware and drivers.
Reseat PCIe expansion card and reboot NAS.
support_data.warranty: 3-year limited manufacturer warranty covering hardware defects

name: QualGear QG-PM-002-BLK Universal Projector Ceiling Mount
description: Adjustable universal projector ceiling mount, black; supports tilt, swivel, height adjustment, and cable management.

troubleshooting_steps: Tighten all screws and bolts.
Adjust pitch and pivot angles carefully.
Use supplied cable clips and check compatibility.

name: Tablet 10 Inch 3GB RAM, Octa-Core Android 10.0 Tablet
description: 10.1'' Android 10.0 tablet with Octa-Core processor, 3GB RAM, 32GB storage (expandable 128GB), dual-band WiFi, 5MP front/13MP rear cameras, GPS, Bluetooth.

common_issues: Tablet heats up during extended gaming
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure router supports dual-band 2.4/5 GHz.
Close background apps and reduce screen brightness.
Re-pair or recharge stylus if needed.

name: Saomil 910 910XL Ink Cartridges Combo Pack
description: Replacement HP 910XL ink cartridges combo pack (Black, Cyan, Magenta, Yellow) with smart chips for instant recognition and high-yield printing.

common_issues: Low ink warnings despite full cartridge
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure smart chip is correctly seated in printer.
Shake cartridge gently before installation.
Clean printer contacts before inserting.

specifications.Compatibility: HP OfficeJet Pro 8020/8024e/8025/8028/8035 and OfficeJet 8010/8015 series

name: Fidget Notebook, Push Pop Bubble Fidget Sensory Toy
description: Spiral notebook with push-pop sensory bubbles for stress relief; suitable for school, office, or personal use.

common_issues: Pop bubbles tear with excessive force
Cover edges fray after prolonged use
troubleshooting_steps: Press bubbles gently to avoid tearing.
Store notebook in a flat position.
Keep notebook away from moisture.

name: Garmin 010-01769-01 Vivoactive 3 Smartwatch
description: Garmin Vivoactive 3 GPS smartwatch with Garmin Pay, built-in sports apps, heart rate monitor, and smartphone notifications. Unisex, durable, with customizable watch faces.

common_issues: Watch not syncing with Garmin Connect app
Garmin Pay not working with certain bank cards
Heart rate sensor not showing readings correctly
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure Bluetooth is enabled and phone is compatible.
Remove and re-add cards in Garmin Pay setup.
Restart the watch and perform a software update.
Calibrate GPS outdoors with clear view of the sky.
Clean the back sensor and wear snugly on wrist.

specifications.Special Features: GPS, Heart Rate Monitor, Notifications, Garmin Pay, Daily Workout Memory
specifications.Battery Life: Up to 7 days in smartwatch mode, 13 hours in GPS mode

name: Ejet 932XL 933XL Ink Cartridges Combo Pack
description: High-yield replacement ink cartridges for HP 932XL/933XL printers (Black, Cyan, Magenta, Yellow). ISO-certified for sharp prints and high compatibility.

common_issues: Low ink warnings despite new cartridge
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure cartridge is fully seated and chip is clean.
Shake cartridge gently before installation.
Clean printer contacts with a lint-free cloth.
Run printer nozzle cleaning cycle.
Verify cartridge model matches printer requirements.

specifications.Features: High Yield, ISO-certified for quality printing

name: VASAJEEVANI Beware Of Smartphone Zombies Tin Sign
description: Retro metal tin sign (8x12 in) for home, office, or restaurant decor. Pre-drilled holes, high-quality aluminum, and versatile gift option for multiple occasions.

common_issues: Holes do not align with standard nails
Double-sided tape does not stick on rough walls
troubleshooting_steps: Use screws or anchors suitable for wall type.
Handle edges carefully while mounting.
Wipe gently with a soft cloth to clean.
Apply tape on smooth, dry surface.
Mount indoors or away from direct sunlight to preserve color.

name: Mount-It! Projector Tripod Stand
description: Adjustable projector tripod stand with tilting tray, anti-skid feet, and portable nylon carrying case. Fits projectors up to 11x15 inches and up to 13 lbs weight.

common_issues: Tripod wobbles on carpet or uneven surfaces
Height adjustment is stiff or stuck
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure locking legs are fully extended and secured.
Check tilt mechanism and remove any debris.
Lubricate carrying case zipper if stuck.
Loosen adjustment knobs slightly and try again.
Use straps included to secure projector tightly.

specifications.Portable: Yes, disassembles into 3 pieces with carrying case

name: Synology 24-Bay FlashStation FS3410 (Diskless)
description: High-performance Synology FS3410 24-bay flash storage solution with iSCSI 4K random read/write IOPS, VMware and Hyper-V certified, Gigabit and 10GbE ports, for servers and high availability applications.

common_issues: Power supply issues during high I/O
troubleshooting_steps: Ensure disks are properly seated and compatible.
Check cables and network switch settings.
Use Synology Assistant to update firmware.
Verify RAID configuration before initializing.
Ensure sufficient power supply and UPS backup.
